item.description:
February 28 – April 5
Humberto Cruz, Cuban born visual artist, solo exhibition. His powerful works consist of textural images and is described as “connecting the geologic strata that form the Earth with the universal layers of life and the human condition”.

Saturday, February 28, 6 – 8 p.m.
Opening Reception Meet the Artist and join us for refreshments with a Cuban flavor!
Windsor Art Center
20 Mechanic Street
Windsor, CT 06095
860-688-2528
info@windsorartcenter.org

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Opening Reception Meet the Artist at Windsor Art Center
